dialogue.text: ...hello?
In my humble opinion, it is you who freed me, yes?
Yes. My armies have freed you and your fellow virtues Charity, Kindness, and Diligence. We need your help to defeat the Lady Sloth.
...what?
In my powerfully humble opinion, she needs a shower.
You people are hopeless.
Hmm...
Is this not the same general I pushed out of these lands some time ago?
Boring. At least bring me somebody new that might test my power.
In my greatly humble opinion, this general is a worthy opponent.
Oh no. Not this guy! General, did you have to bring him back? He never stops sharing his humble opinions.
Believe me, I've noticed.
Hey! In my humble opinion--
Nobody cares about your hot takes!
In my very humble opinion that's not true. I have thousands of followers. I'm going to be an influencer.
General? Can you kill him for me please? I would do it, but I'm overdue on my map.
*sigh*
Urgh!
In my extraordinarily humble opinion, that wasn't too hard.
General, I hope you're happy. You've now enabled another wannabe influencer to add to the white noise of social media.
Am I doing the right thing?
General, I remember this land well. It is here where the mighty and powerful Virtue Chastity has been imprisoned.
It is my excruciatingly humble opinion that we rescue her. Her power is unmatched. If we hope to have any chance against the Mistress of Wrath, she must be freed.
If I must.
